Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Craken watched Prowl plummit to the ground. He hesitated a 
moment....should he pursue the badly damaged bot? Finish him off?
       The thought coursed through the Vhicons mind until he came to a snap 
descision. He would remain at his present location, bombarding the CF. He 
would send Prowl a package.
       Two missles errupted from the turrets on Crakens underside. They 
sailed downaward for Prowl's signiture. The Vhicon watched from above, 
waiting to see the final blast of that Maximal.

       Marine grabbed his hip in pain, but there was only an open wound 
spouting mech fluid. The fem had taken a good chnck of his side out. The 
sensor circuts for pain were registering this at full. His eyes blinked 
several times as Marines internal repairs kicked it. The mech began to 
minimize its flow into a small trickle.
       He didnt stall, his next move would be brutal, but before he could 
counter attack, Ominous Prime and Quasar sent 15 shots each of pure eneron 
energy at Iron Raptor's backside. The blasts exited from the energonians 
palms, and sailed across the air in fast blue streaks. the crackle of the 
energy made Marine stop. It was a terrible sound, and the effects of the 
blasts on a bot, especially in beast mode, would be merciless.

       Jackle saw Marine's side explode off of him as IR attacked him. He 
raised his plasma riffle and sent 15 blasts wizzing for the Maximal leader.

--part1_3b.134a7f5e.280c985b_boundary
